website_summaries.verdict: Stylish and incredibly comfortable for a pair of sandals with this many straps.
pros: Gladiator-style sandals with full-grain leather or metallic leather upper
Comes in black full grain or light brown full grain at Zappos
Amazon offers in black, tan full grain and light gold metallic
Leather lining, lightly cushioned footbed, rubber outsole
cons: Pricey, not easy to slip on

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite shoes. They didn’t have to be broken in, and they are super comfortable and supportive. I have plantar fasciitis and I can wear these shoes all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Copello

customer_reviews.title: stretched out abit.
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my daughter. They got dirty quickly but not in the best way and they stretched out. They were not worth the money, to us.$35.00 would be about right, not 100.00
customer_reviews.author: carolyn brost

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & well made
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Born is always comfortable & well made, which is why I have 4 different styles of their sandals. These are so great, I’m seriously contemplating buying another color. I usually wear an 8.5 but a 9 in Born. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 7 and the 7 fits perfectly. They are exceptionally comfortable, and made my feet feel better even from the first wear.
customer_reviews.author: Soronia

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, so comfortable and fine on short leg! Good neutral color to match everything. Excellent walking sandal.
customer_reviews.author: paddywannabe

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but like the old saying goes you get what you pay for. It's hard for me to find a good fit because wear an 11. They fit great in every aspect. And I'm sure they will last for several years. Good quality leather and thick comfortable soles for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. I could probably wear these all day at ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I could probably wear these all day at an amusement park. Because they are really strappy I am not sure how these shoes would be for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and easy to put on!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 11 and they are true to size, very very comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: jewel box

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: Needed a fun sandal They cut the bill. Comfy and stylish

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Born sandals. Very comfortable from first wear!
customer_reviews.author: M A Prusz

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and comfortable sandal
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is good looking. They are comfortable and easy to put on and off. I only wore them for 45 mins around my house, since it’s cold out still, but I don’t anticipate the straps hurting, as they seem comfortable. Also a very nice versatile color. Lastly, my 16 yr old daughter saw them and asked me to order her a pair too. We aren’t the same size. So I ordered them for her too.
customer_reviews.author: DandNPet

product_meta.title: Born - Womens - Tripoli
product_meta.description: A dynamic gladiator sandal with a smart design
